description: Softing Industrial is a software and hardware manufacturer that specializes in connecting and standardizing data transfers between a variety of industrial automation devices. Softing's dataFEED exporter allows Siemens TIA users to export their project files in the SDFI format. Users can then import these SDFI files into Softing apps that connect to Siemens and other companies' automation controllers.

SDFI files are encrypted and can be opened only with Softing applications. They contain information about the special designations, structure, and variable data types used by an automation controller.
